interpretation: The "mouse trap" card symbolizes caution and being wary of potential dangers. It warns against blindly rushing into situations without thoroughly assessing the risks involved. This card may indicate a need to be vigilant and protect oneself from potential harm or deceit. It can also suggest the need to be strategic and deliberate in one's actions, as hasty decisions may lead to negative consequences. Associated keywords include danger, caution, vigilance, strategic, and protection. When this card appears in a reading, it may be time to take a step back and evaluate the situation before proceeding forward. Trusting one's instincts and intuition can be helpful in navigating potentially treacherous waters. Overall, the "mouse trap" card serves as a reminder to always be aware of potential dangers and to take measures to protect oneself.
